name: Emergency Department
description: The Women and Child Health Department at Mtongani Hospital is dedicated to providing quality healthcare services for women and children of all ages
disease: The department offers a wide range of services, including prenatal and postnatal care, family planning, pediatric care, gynecological exams, breast cancer screenings, and treatment of sexually transmitted infections

name: Women and Child Health Department
description: The Emergency Department is the first point of contact for patients with serious or life-threatening medical conditions. It is staffed by highly trained doctors, nurses, and other medical professionals who are available 24/7 to provide rapid assessment, diagnosis, and treatment. The Emergency Department is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to support advanced medical procedures and interventions
disease: heart attack, stroke, severe injuries, severe allergic reactions, and other life-threatening conditions

name: Radiology Department
description: The Radiology Department provides diagnostic imaging services to help diagnose and treat various medical conditions. It uses advanced imaging technology, including X-rays, CT scans, MRI scans, and ultrasounds, to produce detailed images of the inside of the body
disease: bone fractures, tumors, internal bleeding, and other conditions requiring diagnostic imaging

name: Pulmonology Department
description: The Pulmonology Department specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of respiratory disorders. It includes services such as diagnostic testing, medication management, and rehabilitation
disease: asthma, COPD, pneumonia, lung cancer, and other respiratory disorders

name: Gastroenterology Department
description: The Gastroenterology Department specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of digestive disorders. It provides services such as endoscopy, colonoscopy, and nutritional counseling
disease: irritable bowel syndrome, GERD, inflammatory bowel disease, and other digestive disorders

name: Cancellation Department
description: The Cancellation Department is responsible for processing and managing the cancellation of appointments and medical procedures. Patients can request cancellation of their appointments through this department
disease: Cancellation of medical appointments and procedures

name: Obstetrics and Gynecology
description: Our obstetrics and gynecology department provides comprehensive care for women throughout all stages of life, from pregnancy to menopause. Our team of experienced obstetricians and gynecologists provides preventive care, prenatal care, labor and delivery services, and management of gynecological conditions
disease: Prenatal care, childbirth, family planning, infertility, menstrual problems, and menopause

name: Medication Department
description: The Medication Department is responsible for the procurement, storage, and dispensing of medication to patients. This department ensures that patients receive the correct medication and dosage as prescribed by their physicians
disease: Dispensing of medication, prescription refills, medication counseling, medication storage and handling

name: HIV Special Counseling
description: Provides counseling services to individuals with HIV and AIDS. The department also offers education and support for those affected by the virus.
